doc.field: jobs. in his book, perry called global warming 'one contrived phony mess that is falling apart under its own weight.' and now, even mitt romney, who proposed plans to reduce greenhouse gas emissions when he was governor of massachusetts, thinks that the epa shouldn't try to do anything about global warming. and do i support the epa? in much of its mission, yes. but in some of its mission, no the epa getting into carbon
